about_the_game: Your characters enter the mansion.to survive, you need to find ammunition, first-aid kits, your task is to find out what happened and why all the inhabitants of the mansion turned into monsters.There are many beautiful statues and paintings here.There is something to see. here you can meet such enemies as huge scary spiders with female heads that will hunt you all over the mansion, crazy nuns who will want to sacrifice you to their god.To open the chests, you will need lock picks to open the lock.To survive, you will need to think of a safe way, otherwise you will be eaten.together with the main character, you will be accompanied by his companion, who from time to time will give hints on what to do next.various dialogues will take place between them.Explore the mansion and the huge cathedral in search of clues, clues to bring the investigation to an end. To solve the riddles, you will have to use your brain.
